Entry.JapaneseText: バルカへ行くには サニイタウンから船だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: We're going to take a boat from Sunnytown to get to Balka, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、その前にトヨホウス河を下らないとな。 街のすぐそばを流れてるのがそうだぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, but first we need to go down the Toyohose River. It runs right along the outskirts of the city.
